name: After Burner: Black Falcon
description:
EXPERIENCE HIGH-SPEED, EXPLOSIVE FLIGHT COMBAT.
13 DEADLY JETS HAVE BEEN STOLEN BY THE REBEL GROUP BLACK FALCON DESTINED FOR THE HANDS OF TERRORISTS. STRAP YOURSELF IN THE COCKPIT, PURSUE THE ESCAPING PLANES AND DESTROY ALL LAND AND AIR BASED ENEMIES IN YOUR PATH.

19 OFFICIAL MILITARY AIRCRAFT, INCLUDING F-14 TOMCAT, AV-88 HARRIER II, B-2A BOMBER AND F/A-18E SUPER HORNET PLUS COMPETITIVE AND CO-OP MODES.

CUSTOMISE YOUR JET WITH DESTRUCTIVE WEAPONS, ENGINE UPGRADES AND EXTREME SKINS.
